name: The Saddest Day
description:
LD50 Submission - Delay the Inevitable

Keep the big red balloon from popping on the needle for as long as possible... but not forever.

Enjoy the existential silence as the balloon falls

Contains variable game length, Short is a minute or so, Long can be hours. 

Has offline progress. The balloon can pop while you're away!

Controls

Mouse - Click on the balloon which resets the timer.

Q - Quit back to menu from main game
